name: John Oliver
monologue: And I guess all of this really leads me to the main question that you’re probably all asking right now, which is: why? Why did I do this? Well, that’s a question that for what it’s worth, I don’t think was ever asked of the inventors of the meat beater, the non-pencil, or butthole bags. But it is one that I’m willing to answer nonetheless. And in many ways, I think I did this for no reason. But in some ways, I might have done it for the greatest reason of all because for all of Mike Lindell’s many, many, many, many, many faults. He is at the end of the day also weirdly inspiring. He’s the manifestation of the American dream that someone can overcome drug problems, pull himself up by his bootstraps, and undermine confidence in a national election, all while hawking some of the worst pillows in the history of humanity.
